scripts.test: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.test dotenv -e .env.test -- node --import tsx --test packages/**/src/**/*.test.ts apps/**/src/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:mysql: TEST_DATABASES=MySQL dotenv -e .env.test -- node --import tsx --test packages/**/src/**/*.test.ts apps/**/src/tests/integration.test.ts
scripts.test:postgres: TEST_DATABASES=Postgres dotenv -e .env.test -- node --import tsx --test packages/**/src/**/*.test.ts apps/**/src/tests/integration.test.ts
scripts.test:dynamodb: TEST_DATABASES=DynamoDB dotenv -e .env.test -- node --import tsx --test packages/**/src/**/*.test.ts apps/**/src/tests/integration.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:bare: CONTAINER_LIFECYCLE=skip DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.test dotenv -e .env.test -- node --import tsx --test apps/**/src/tests/integration.test.ts
scripts.clear: npm run clean && npm run clean --workspaces --if-present
scripts.rebuild: npm run clear && npm run cleanbuild
